summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MiroBridge MVP - all core features working perfectly. Backend APIs (100% success), frontend UI/UX, AI summarization with Claude Sonnet 4.5, and PPTX export all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: GET /api/board - Mock Miro board data with 4 frames and 17 sticky notes
GET /api/board/mapped - Coordinate-based mapping of notes to frames
POST /api/summarize - AI summarization with Claude Sonnet 4.5
POST /api/summarize-all - Bulk AI processing for all frames
Frontend board display with proper frame/note rendering
Generate Slides button with AI processing workflow
Slide Preview tab with 4 generated slides
Speaker notes toggle showing original sticky note content
